title: Can we make it so blocked players can't try to add you as a contact?
body: Can we block the friend request from being sent?

replies.body: If a player is blocked, they shouldn't be able to add you as a friend.  If they are trying to subvert this by making another account, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further.
I've been getting a few players that are super abusive so I block them after the game, and then I still seem to be getting friend requests from them.
